As we celebrate progress during #BlackHistoryMonth, it‚Äôs important to recognize challenges that remain:
üí∞ Black Americans experience more socioeconomic barriers to wealth
üè† Black children are more likely to live in poverty
üçº Rising costs of childcare unequally harm Black moms

This #ValentinesDay, I‚Äôll be sharing how the #CSSBMB is working to address inequities in areas like criminal justice that disproportionately affect Black males. #DidYouKnow Black males comprise ~40% of America‚Äôs prison population, but comprise less than 6% of the US population? https://t.co/qX6gTNOFe2
